trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento "SourceChanged" in elementi listener specifici.

trans-unit.source: The "SourceChanged" event that this delegate represents handlers for is not exposed as a public [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, as is the case with most routed events.
trans-unit.target: L'evento "SourceChanged" che rappresenta i gestori per questo delegato non è esposta come un pubblico [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] evento, come accade con gli eventi indirizzati più.

trans-unit.source: Instead, "SourceChanged" is a routed event that remains private to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is direct routed.
trans-unit.target: "SourceChanged" è invece un evento indirizzato che resta privato per la [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dell'infrastruttura e diretto.

trans-unit.source: Because it is direct routed, `sender` and the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data are always the same object.
trans-unit.target: Perché è diretto indirizzati `sender` e <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>nei dati sono sempre lo stesso oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add and remove handlers to this event despite the private access level of the event itself by using the public methods <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere e rimuovere i gestori per questo evento nonostante il livello di accesso privata dell'evento stesso utilizzando i metodi pubblici <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A> </xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `sender` of the event will be a derived class of <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>.
trans-unit.target: Il `sender` dell'evento sarà una classe derivata di <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>.</xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>
